name: Fizmo.org
body:
# Welcome

Fizmo.org is the home for various small open-source projects maintained by Christopher Currie (@christophercurrie), in various stages of completeness.

## [Dropwizard Bundle for Guice](https://github.com/fizmo/dropwizard-bundle-guice)

A module for Dropwizard to facilitate Guice integration.

## [Scala Classmate](https://github.com/fizmo/scala-classmate)

A prototype library for Scala type reflection, agnostic of Scala version.

## [Jade.net](https://github.com/fizmo/jade.net)

A prototype port of the Jade HTML template engine to .NET
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
